snippet: By enabling the Syrian dictator, Russia and China also have blood on their hands.
abstract: Editorial condemns Russia and China for refusing to seriously cooperate with the United Nations Security Council to increase international pressure on Syria's Pres Bashar al-Assad; asserts that by enabling the Syrian dictator, the two countries also have blood on their hands.
lead_paragraph: By enabling the Syrian dictator, Russia and China also have blood on their hands.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
